channel.title: Stress Cops - The Brightest Side of Stress Management.
channel.description: What is Stress Cops Podcast Show? Produced by Quantum Learning Center, a Quantum-Self company, is the official podcasting voice of todays leading Internet and PodCast stress solutions and technologies. Very lively and personal solutions-oriented stress reduction podcasting... insightful stories, interviews, and proven-effective stress management techniques and solutions. Hosted by radio personalities and expert Stress Cops, Dr Jill Ammon-Wexler and Chantal Piscopo.

item.title: Stomp Out Procrastination Stress
item.description:
In this Stress Cops PodCast Radio Show broadcast we share valuable insight into one of the major sources of stress -- procrastination.  Learn first hand about the frustrations of a writer that never writes, and how YOU can overcome the intense stress of never quite getting to your source of passion. Learn the one sure-fire cure for procrastination stress, and how to use this tool to create a stress free life.

If you have a challenge with procrastination stress, you may want to do some Quantum-Self mental re-programming. Procrastination is a habit. And like any other habit, it will only go away if replaced with other behavior patterns.

The Stress Cops Radio Show
Where we always talk stress management and stress reduction.

item.title: Less stress - The true secret of time management!
item.description:
In this edition of the Stress Cops PodCast Radio Show, we bring you a very special stress reduction broadcast. Stress runs rampant through our work environments today, and stress management has become a concern for all. One of the greatest sources of stress is the feeling of time pressure. In this broadcast the Quantum-Self .com Stress Cops discuss the one true secret to truly effective and immediate stress free time management.
 
The Stress Cops Radio Show
Where we always talk stress management and stress reduction.

item.title: Worry = stress intense negative goal setting
item.description:
In this edition of the Stress Cops PodCast Radio Show we dig into one of the greatest source of stress -- worry. Worry is actually stress running around nonstop in the back of your mind as an on-going source of confusion-creating stress. Worry is powerful -- it is actually stress intensive *negative goal setting.* We are here to help you laugh away your stress -- and learn some easy, but effective, stress management tools.  And if you are hungry for even more sizzling stress management and stress reduction articles by the Stress Cops, come visit our website. Plus while you are at it,  come pick up your copy our FREE month-long sizzling stress free prosperity course. Financial stress is the one of the most painful sources of stress we know of today. In many ways, it is the equivalent of the saber tooth tiger that stressed our ancient relatives. Do not let it continue to gnaw at your ankle in the middle of the night.

The Stress Cops Radio Show
Where we always talk REAL stress management and stress reduction.

item.title: Best way to *immediately* reduce your stress
item.description:
In this edition of the Stress Cops PodCast Radio Show we explain what stress *really* is, and show how one particular response can immediately stop stress cold in its tracks. We are here to help you laugh away your stress -- and learn some easy, but effective, stress management tools.  And if you are hungry for even more sizzling stress management and stress reduction articles by the Stress Cops, come visit our website. Plus while you are at it,  come pick up your copy our FREE month-long sizzling prosperity course. Financial stress is the one of the most painful sources of stress we know of today. In many ways, it is the equivalent of the saber tooth tiger that stressed our ancient relatives. Do not let it continue to gnaw at your ankle in the middle of the night.

The Stress Cops Radio Show

item.title: Our Launch Date is Set
item.description:
In this edition of the Stress Cops PodCast Radio Show we bring you a progress report about our new stress reduction and stress management radio show. Here is the good news. Stress Cops Radio is coming online this coming Wednesday October 5th with our first stress busting broadcast. Join us to learn why laughter dissolves stress, and even gives you the equivalent of a stress free aerobic workout. And we guarantee you are going to get a great big, healthy laugh.

In the meantime, you'll find great stress management and stress reduction articles and tools here.

The Stress Cops Radio Show
Where we always talk stress management and stress reduction.
